definition: to meet with (sb who is paying a visit)/CL:次[ci4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Deputy Mayor He Jihua meets with principal members of Kagoshima Cultural Exchange Group.
sentences.chinese: 市長何寄華會見鹿兒島文化藝術交流團的主要成員。

sentences.english: Following that, the two heads of state jointly met with journalists from the media of China, Chile and other countries.
sentences.chinese: 隨後兩國元首共同會見了中智兩國和國際傳媒記者。

sentences.english: At 10 a. m. next day, Secretary-general Yao Haitao met Ms.
sentences.chinese: 次日上午10時，姚海濤祕書長親切會見了陸潔女士。

sentences.english: This afternoon, State Councilor Dai Bingguo will meet with him.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午戴秉國國務委員也將會見他。

sentences.english: Premier Wen Jiabao also met with Deputy President Motlanthe yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，溫家寶總理也會見了莫特蘭蒂副總統。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇等中方陪同人員參加會見。

sentences.english: On the same day Wen also met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Dr. Mahathir bin Mohamad.
sentences.chinese: 同日，溫家寶還會見了馬來西亞前總理馬哈蒂爾。

sentences.english: During President Condé's visit, Chinese leaders will meet with him.
sentences.chinese: 孔戴總統訪華期間，中國國家領導人將與他進行會見。

sentences.english: Sun expressed his welcome to Mr. Yu and his group.
sentences.chinese: 會見中，孫金龍對鬱亮一行來肥表示歡迎。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Li Zhaoxing and other officials were present at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 外交部長李肇星等會見時在座。

sentences.english: To travels frequently in China and also abroad, on trips to meet donors.
sentences.chinese: 杜聰在中國和國外頻繁穿梭旅行，會見捐贈者。

sentences.english: Tang also met with ROK Foreign Minister Yu Myung-hwan.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇還會見了韓國外交通商部長官柳明桓。

sentences.english: And we also had the privilege of meeting with some of their families, as well as some of the courageous survivors.
sentences.chinese: 我們還有幸會見了部分罹難者家屬和無畏的倖存者。

sentences.english: And I'm playing my lyre on the golden coast, expecting to meet you there.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在金色的海岸彈起琴絃，等待與你會見。

sentences.english: Governor of Hunan Province Mei Kebao also attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 省委副書記梅克保參加會見。

sentences.english: In 1866 Annie met the Rev. Frank Besant.
sentences.chinese: 在1866年會見了安妮牧師坦誠貝贊特。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to pay a visit/to call on
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
